MODULE.DESCRIPTION: A wrapper to instantiate the PowerPC 440 Processor Block primitive

PARAMETER.NAME: C_ENDIAN_RESET
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Reset Value for Endian Storage Byte Ordering

PARAMETER.NAME: C_USER_RESET
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Reset Value for User Defined Storage Attributes: Tattribute[4:7]

PARAMETER.NAME: C_ICU_RD_FETCH_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for all CPU Fetch Requests

PARAMETER.NAME: C_ICU_RD_SPEC_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for all Speculative CPU Fetch Requests

PARAMETER.NAME: C_ICU_RD_TOUCH_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for all CPU Fetch Requests Initiated by ICBT Instructions

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_RD_LD_CACHE_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for all CPU Cacheable Load Requests

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_RD_NONCACHE_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for CPU Non-cacheable Load Requests

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_RD_TOUCH_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for all CPU Load Requests Initiated by DCBT Instructions

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_RD_URGENT_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for an Urgent CPU Load Request

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_WR_FLUSH_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for CPU Write Requests Initiated by flush Instruction

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_WR_STORE_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for CPU Write Requests Initiated by store Instructions

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCU_WR_URGENT_PLB_PRIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Arbitration Priority for an Urgent CPU Write Request

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_ROW_CONFLICT_MASK
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Mask Used to Determine a Row Conflict

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_BANK_CONFLICT_MASK
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Mask Used to Determine a Bank Conflict

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_CONTROL
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Control and Configuration for the MC Interface

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_PRIO_ICU
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Priority for all Instruction Fetches from CPU

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_PRIO_DCUW
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Priority for all Data Writes from CPU

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_PRIO_DCUR
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Priority for all Data Reads from CPU

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_PRIO_SPLB1
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Priority for SPLB1, DMA2 and DMA3

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_PRIO_SPLB0
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Priority for SPLB0, DMA0 and DMA1

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPC440MC_MAX_BURST
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Max Number of Quad-words per Burst thru Xbar to MC Interface

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MPLB_PRIO_ICU
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Prio for Instr Fetches

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MPLB_PRIO_DCUW
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Prio for Data Writes

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MPLB_PRIO_DCUR
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Prio for Data Reads

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MPLB_PRIO_SPLB1
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Prio for SPLB1, DMA2, DMA3

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MPLB_PRIO_SPLB0
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Secondary Arbitration Prio for SPLB0, DMA0, DMA1

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MPLB_MAX_BURST
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Max Num of Quad-words in Bursts

PARAMETER.NAME: C_SPLB0_USE_MPLB_ADDR
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Allow SPLB0 to Access MPLB Addr

PARAMETER.NAME: C_SPLB0_PROPAGATE_MIRQ
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Propagate MIRQ Signals from Xbar onto SPLB

PARAMETER.NAME: C_SPLB1_USE_MPLB_ADDR
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Allow SPLB1 to Access MPLB Addr

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DCR_AUTOLOCK_ENABLE
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Enable the Auto-lock Feature for the DCR Indirect Mode

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPCDM_ASYNCMODE
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Synchronization Mode for the External MDCR Interface

PARAMETER.NAME: C_PPCDS_ASYNCMODE
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Synchronization Mode for the External SDCR Interface

PARAMETER.NAME: C_GENERATE_PLB_TIMESPECS
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Generate Timing Constraint to Resynchronize SPLB MBusy Outputs

MODULE.DESCRIPTION: 'Xilinx 64-bit Processor Local Bus (PLB) consists of a bus control unit, a watchdog timer, and separate address, write, and read data path units with a a three-cycle only arbitration feature'

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Include DCR Interface and Error Registers

PARAMETER.NAME: C_NUM_CLK_PLB2OPB_REARB
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: <qt>Number of PLB Clock Periods a PLB Master that Received a Rearbitrate from an OPB2PLB Bridge on a Read Operation is Denied Grant on the PLB Bus</qt>

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Master ID Bus Width of PLB

PARAMETER.NAME: C_SPLB_SUPPORT_BURSTS
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: PLB Slave is Capable of Bursts

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Number of Generated DDR Clock Pairs.

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Column Address Width of DDR Memory

PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Number of Chip Select in DDR2 Memory Rank (a.k.a log2C_NUM_RANKS_MEM)

PARAMETER.NAME: C_DDR_RAWIDTH
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Row Address Width of DDR Memory

PARAMETER.NAME: C_MIB_MC_CLOCK_RATIO
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Clock Ratio between CPMINTERCONNECTCLK to DDR2 Clock

PARAMETER.NAME: C_REDUCE_DRV
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Reduce drive strength of DDR I/O (=1 yes)

PARAMETER.NAME: C_NUM_IDELAYCTRL
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Number of IDELAYCTRL Primitives (V4 only) that are explicitly instantiated
